effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. User charges for one turn before attacking. Critical hit chance is one level higher than normal. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. User charges for one turn before attacking. Critical hit chance is one level higher than normal. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. User charges for one turn before attacking. Critical hit chance is one level higher than normal. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

short_effect.sun-moon: User charges for one turn before attacking. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: User charges for one turn before attacking. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: User charges for one turn before attacking. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.
